original_title: Неужели мы никогда не будем счастливы?
overview: Diana and Vladimir are in love for more than seven years. After a sudden quarrel Vladimir flew to Bali. Diana is now ready to forgive him and can’t wait for him to come back to her to Saint Petersburg. After being apart for eight months they finally want to see each other and decide what to do next.
title: Won’t We Ever Be Happy?
